languages.text: "Регент Ааронто, представители вашего Дома устроили покушение на леди Кассию и атаковали Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Регент Ааронто, представители вашего Дома устроили покушение на леди Кассию и атаковали Вольного Торговца".

languages.text: "Regent Aaronto, representatives of your House made an attempt on Lady Cassia's life and attacked a Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Регент Ааронто, представители вашего Дома устроили покушение на леди Кассию и атаковали Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Regent Aaronto, the representatives of your House made an attempt on Lady Cassia's life and attacked a Rogue Trader."
"Regent Aaronto, the representatives of your House made an attempt on Lady Cassia's life and attacked a Rogue Trader."

"Regent Aaronto, representatives of your House made an attempt on Lady Cassia's life and attacked a Rogue Trader."

languages.text: “阿伦托摄政王，你们家族的代表试图杀害卡西娅女士，还袭击了行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "Regent Aaronto, representatives of your House made an attempt on Lady Cassia's life and attacked a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “阿伦托摄政王，你们家族的代表试图杀害卡西娅女士，还袭击了行商浪人。”

languages.text: «Regente Aaronto, representantes de su casa atentaron contra la vida de Cassia y atacaron a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Regent Aaronto, representatives of your House made an attempt on Lady Cassia's life and attacked a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Regente Aaronto, representantes de su casa atentaron contra la vida de Cassia y atacaron a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「摂政アーロント、貴家の代表が、カシア殿の生命を狙い、自由開拓者を襲ったのだ」
languages.original_text: "Regent Aaronto, representatives of your House made an attempt on Lady Cassia's life and attacked a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「摂政アーロント、貴家の代表が、カシア殿の生命を狙い、自由開拓者を襲ったのだ」

languages.text: "Regent Aaronto, Vertreter Eures Hauses haben einen Anschlag auf Lady Cassias Leben verübt und {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} angegriffen."
languages.original_text: "Regent Aaronto, representatives of your House made an attempt on Lady Cassia's life and attacked a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Regent Aaronto, Vertreter Eures Hauses haben einen Anschlag auf Lady Cassias Leben verübt und {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} angegriffen."

languages.text: « Régent Aaronto, des représentants de votre maison ont tenté d'assassiner dame Cassia et s'en sont pris {mf|à un libre-marchand|à une libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Regent Aaronto, representatives of your House made an attempt on Lady Cassia's life and attacked a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Régent Aaronto, des représentants de votre maison ont tenté d'assassiner dame Cassia et s'en sont pris {mf|à un libre-marchand|à une libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Naip Aaronto, Hane'nin temsilcileri Leydi Cassia'nın yaşamına kastedip bir Hür Tacir'e saldırdı."
languages.original_text: "Regent Aaronto, representatives of your House made an attempt on Lady Cassia's life and attacked a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Naip Aaronto, Hane'nin temsilcileri Leydi Cassia'nın yaşamına kastetti ve bir Hür Tacir'e saldırdı."
